title: Two Fonts to ID Please
content:
Both look like they've been altered. any help would be appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type-id_5911.jpg)
author: dwpear

comments.content:
"Green" has a 'G' that started as [ITC Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_tiffany_std_complete_vp/?&sample_text=Green&sample_size=96).

"Namez" is likely a [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) [Lithos](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/lithos_pro_complete_vp/?&sample_text=NAMEZ&sample_size=96).

I'd suspect NAMEZ is Futura.  
De- [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/squooshed):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052728im_/http:/typophile.com/files/namez_4474.gif)
Good one. I assumed the angled terminals would disappear with that amount of distortion, but surely not that much.
Cheers. I must seem like I secretly enjoy squooshing type over breakfast!
